body_html:
Either you fix it like this, which would be my preference without looking at the code, it seems like you haven't actually changed the code, so what I was suggesting is that you just undo the formatting change.
…
On Thu, Nov 8, 2018, 1:05 PM FAIJUL ***@***.*** wrote: @drpngx <https://github.com/drpngx> Do you suggest any function call like TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR? The problem CHECK_EQ is inside some function whose return type is void and is outside OpKernel so we can't use OP_REQUIRES either. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Either you fix it like this, which would be my preference without looking
at the code, it seems like you haven't actually changed the code, so what I
was suggesting is that you just undo the formatting change.

On Thu, Nov 8, 2018, 1:05 PM FAIJUL <notifications@github.com wrote:

> @drpngx <https://github.com/drpngx> Do you suggest any function call like
> TF_RETURN_IF_ERROR? The problem CHECK_EQ is inside some function whose
> return type is void and is outside OpKernel so we can't use OP_REQUIRES
> either.
>
> —
